script.name: plugin.boarding.marines.timer
script.description: Improved Boarding: Increase amount of marines on NPC's
script.sourceplaintext:
$debug = [FALSE]
$aRaces = get race array: include fixed=[FALSE], include corporations=[TRUE], include player=[FALSE] append Guilds to array $aRaces * Do not add marines to Xenon or Khaak find and remove: Xenon from array $aRaces find and remove: Kha'ak from array $aRaces * Special handling for Other. find and remove: Other from array $aRaces
@ $percent = [THIS] -> call script plugin.boarding.marines.getamt : $current.time = playing time
* Assign ships from race Other with a bounty to their nominated race. $shipsBounty = table alloc $aShips = array alloc: size=0 $shipsOther = get ship array: of race Other class/type=Big Ship $i = size of array $shipsOther while $i dec $i = $ship = $shipsOther[$i] $bounty = $ship -> get local variable: name='bounty' if not $bounty append $ship to array $aShips continue end $race = $bounty['gov'] if not $race append $ship to array $aShips continue end
$array = $shipsBounty[$race] if not $array $array = array alloc: size=0 $shipsBounty[$race] = $array end append $ship to array $array end
* Add marines to any race non-bounty race Other ships. $race = Other gosub sub.RaceShips
* Main loop $i = size of array $aRaces while $i dec $i = $race = $aRaces[$i]
do if $debug write to log file #$debug append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='Adding marines to race %s', $race, null, null, null, null
* get all big ships from race $aShips = get ship array: of race $race class/type=Big Ship $aShipsBounty = $shipsBounty[$race] do if $aShipsBounty $aShips = merge arrays, $aShips, $aShipsBounty, null, null, null
gosub sub.RaceShips end
return null
* ================== * Run through ships of a race * ================== sub.RaceShips:
skip if $aShips endsub $s.count = size of array $aShips skip if $s.count endsub
@ $probabilities = [THIS] -> call script lib.guilds.marine.getraceprobability : =$race if $debug write to log file #$debug append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='Marine probability table for race: %s', $race, null, null, null, null @ = [THIS] -> call script debug.printdata.table : Data Table=$probabilities File ID=$debug Tab='' end
$doAmt = ( $s.count * $percent ) / 100
while $doAmt @ = wait 10 ms dec $s.count = do if $s.count == -1 break
$s = random value from 0 to $s.count - 1 $ship = $aShips[$s] remove element from array $aShips at index $s dec $doAmt =
do if $debug gosub sub.Debug
* It would be cheating to add marines during combat do if $ship -> get attacker continue * Avoid breaking immersion by adding marines in active sector do if $ship -> is in active sector continue * Check against last time marines were added to this ship $last.time = $ship -> get local variable: name='last.marines' do if $last.time AND ( $last.time + 3600 ) > $current.time continue
gosub sub.AddMarines $ship ->set local variable: name='last.marines' value=$current.time end @ = wait 100 ms endsub * ============== * Add marines to ship * ============== sub.AddMarines: skip if $ship -> get true amount of ware Cargo Lifesupport System in cargo bay = $ship -> install 1 units of Cargo Lifesupport System
$max = $ship -> get maximum number of marines $free = $ship -> free space for marines $half = $max / 2
do if $free < $half endsub
$amt = random value from $half to $max - 1 inc $amt = if $amt > $free $amt = $free end $task = $ship -> get next available task: starting=[Task.StartFree] $ship ->start task $task with script !galaxyeditor.obj.addmarine and prio 10: arg1=$amt arg2=[TRUE] arg3=$probabilities arg4=null arg5=null
endsub * =============== * Log ship for debugging * =============== sub.Debug: $sector = $ship -> get sector $id = $ship -> get ID code $name = $ship -> get name $owner = $ship -> get true owner if $owner == $race $owner = '' else * Should only record bounty ships of race 'Other' $owner = ' | Actual owner: ' + $owner end write to log file #$debug append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='Adding marines to "%s" | ID %s | race "%s" | sector "%s"%s', $name, $id, $race, $sector, $owner endsub
return null

comment.var: Do not add marines to Xenon or Khaak
Assign ships from race Other with a bounty to their nominated race.
Add marines to any race non-bounty race Other ships.
get all big ships from race
Run through ships of a race
It would be cheating to add marines during combat
Avoid breaking immersion by adding marines in active sector
Check against last time marines were added to this ship
Should only record bounty ships of race 'Other'
